pages.text: "Basically a buffed and jacked up $(l:generators/solar_generator)Solar Generator$(/l)."$(p)The Advanced Solar Generator is essentially an upgraded version of the $(l:generators/solar_generator)Solar Generator$(/l). It has a production rate 6 times the production rate of a $(l:generators/solar_generator)Solar Generator$(/l).

Aside from a major power production difference, the Advanced Solar Generator also takes up more space, requiring a 3x3x3 area whereas compared to the $(l:generators/solar_generator)Solar Generator's$(/l) 1x1x1 space requirement.
